history.proof: intros l1 l2 Hperm Hulist. induction Hperm. - apply Hulist. - inversion Hulist. apply ulist_cons. + intro Hin. srun best use: permutation_in, permutation_sym. + apply IHHperm. sfirstorder depth: 3use: ulist_nil. - inversion Hulist. apply ulist_cons. + intro Hin. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: ulist_nil. + inversion H. apply ulist_cons. * intro Hin. sfirstorder depth: 3use: ulist_nil. * sauto lq: on depth: 3use: ulist_nil. - apply IHHperm2. apply IHHperm1. apply Hulist.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a : A l1, l2 : list A Hperm : permutation l2 l1 Hulist : ulist (a :: l2) IHHperm : ulist l2 -> ulist l1 a0 : A l : list A H1 : ~ In a l2 H2 : ulist l2 H : a0 = a H0 : l = l2 Hin : In a l1 Unable to unify "ulist l2" with "False".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a : A l1, l2 : list A Hperm : permutation l2 l1 Hulist : ulist (a :: l2) IHHperm : ulist l2 -> ulist l1 a0 : A l : list A H1 : ~ In a l2 H2 : ulist l2 H : a0 = a H0 : l = l2 Hin : In a l1 Unable to unify "In a l1" with "False".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a : A l1, l2 : list A Hperm : permutation l2 l1 Hulist : ulist (a :: l2) IHHperm : ulist l2 -> ulist l1 a0 : A l : list A H1 : ~ In a l2 H2 : ulist l2 H : a0 = a H0 : l = l2 Unable to unify "ulist (a :: l2)" with "ulist l2".

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a : A l1, l2 : list A Hperm : permutation l2 l1 Hulist : ulist (a :: l2) IHHperm : ulist l2 -> ulist l1 a0 : A l : list A H1 : ~ In a l2 H2 : ulist l2 H : a0 = a H0 : l = l2 Unable to unify "ulist (?M1456 :: ?M1457)" with "ulist l2".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b : A l : list A Hulist : ulist (a :: b :: l) a0 : A l0 : list A H1 : ~ In a (b :: l) H2 : ulist (b :: l) H : a0 = a H0 : l0 = b :: l Hin : In b (a :: l) Unable to unify "ulist (b :: l)" with "False".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b : A l : list A Hulist : ulist (a :: b :: l) a0 : A l0 : list A H1 : ~ In a (b :: l) H2 : ulist (b :: l) H : a0 = a H0 : l0 = b :: l Hin : In b (a :: l) Unable to unify "In b (a :: l)" with "False".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b : A l : list A Hulist : ulist (a :: b :: l) a0 : A l0 : list A H1 : ~ In a (b :: l) H2 : ulist (b :: l) H : a0 = a H0 : l0 = b :: l H3 : a0 = a Hin : In a l Unable to unify "ulist (b :: l)" with "False".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b : A l : list A Hulist : ulist (a :: b :: l) a0 : A l0 : list A H1 : ~ In a (b :: l) H2 : ulist (b :: l) H : a0 = a H0 : l0 = b :: l H3 : a0 = a Hin : In a l Unable to unify "In a l" with "False".
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b : A l : list A Hulist : ulist (a :: b :: l) a0 : A l0 : list A H1 : ~ In a (b :: l) H2 : ulist (b :: l) H : a0 = a H0 : l0 = b :: l H3 : a0 = a Unable to unify "ulist []" with "ulist l".

original: intros l1 l2 Hperm Hulist. induction Hperm. - apply Hulist. - inversion Hulist. apply ulist_cons. + intro Hin. apply H2. * simpl. auto. * simpl. right. apply Hin. + apply IHHperm. intros a Hin. apply Hulist. simpl. right. apply Hin. - inversion Hulist. apply ulist_cons. + intro Hin. apply H2. * simpl. auto. * simpl. right. apply Hin. + inversion H. apply ulist_cons. * intro Hin. apply H2. -- simpl. auto. -- simpl. right. apply Hin. * apply ulist_nil. - apply IHHperm2. apply IHHperm1. apply Hulist.
